notes.body:
Hello team,
I just gave my return pack of Maxiflow inhaler 250 to one of your pick up
agents who happened to call me before arriving at my door step and
thereafter collected the same.
This is to update you about it and however i wasn't provided with any
return receipt or something to acknowledge the return being processed
further.
Hence, i appreciate the return being happening as per time now and also
look forward for the return/refund process to turn out as per schedule.
notes.body_html:
Hello team,
I just gave my return pack of Maxiflow inhaler 250 to one of your pick up agents who happened to call me before arriving at my door step and thereafter collected the same.
This is to update you about it and however i wasn't provided with any return receipt or something to acknowledge the return being processed further.
Hence, i appreciate the return being happening as per time now and also look forward for the return/refund process to turn out as per schedule.

notes.body: Hello Nilanjan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #655500231125237760-65353, I see your order is at the confirmation stage and assigned for a Doctor Teleconsultation.     Our partner doctor tried contacting your multiple times. However, he was unable to connect with you.      We are unable to proceed further with the order until the call is successfully completed.     Please note that we are unable to modify the order once it has been placed. Hence, I request you to place a new order with a valid prescription.     To know more about the valid prescription please visit the link mentioned below.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/general-enquiries-43000348790/what-is-a-valid-prescription--43000187796     I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Nilanjan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655500231125237760-65353, I see your order is at the confirmation stage and assigned for a Doctor Teleconsultation.

Our partner doctor tried contacting your multiple times. However, he was unable to connect with you. 

We are unable to proceed further with the order until the call is successfully completed.

Please note that we are unable to modify the order once it has been placed. Hence, I request you to place a new order with a valid prescription.

To know more about the valid prescription please visit the link mentioned below.
https://pharmeasy.in/help/general-enquiries-43000348790/what-is-a-valid-prescription--43000187796

I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body_html:
Hello Arif,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order # 653458379777769472-16056, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We tried to call you regarding the concern raised however we are unable to establish contact with you.

As per update received form our team, please be informed that marking of order can not be changes. However if you want to return any medicine form this order kinkldy reach usa back with the name and quantity of medicine to be returned we willarange manual pick up for the same and once pick up completed we will reufdn accordingly.

Further, the request for refund of loyalti cashback of Rs.85.01 /- in the PharmEasy wallet (credits) has been sent and the same will be reflected in your PharmEasy wallet within 24-48 hours.  We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
  
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

Respected sir
Respected Sir/ Madam
I Kamal Kumar Agrawal booked some lab tests for my mother on 02.12.2025 and
order id is 6224735 . The sample collection time is 8.00 to 9.00 AM  on
03.12.2025. But your Lab technician has not attended the same.

I Have called 4times to your customer service executive but they are unable
to give any solution in this regards.

My patient is a old age women and she is in fasting for more then 12 hours
thus who is responsible for this situation if some thing happens to her.

so requesting you to give  quick responsible response in this regards.


AGAIN on 03.12.2025 the appointment was reschedule for 04.12.2025 at 7.30
to 8.30 AM  but no call has been received and none of your
representative come to collect blood sample .  After that i have called
several times to your customer executive then at 9.30 AM a person came and
took blood . This is quite Ridiculous such a big company with
irresponsible   commitment.

money which i have paid . Because you have not attended on 03.12.2025 and
on 04.12.2024 you are delayed by 1.30 hours.

So please my money  with immediately.

Thanking You
Kamal Kumar Agarwal

notes.body: Hello ​Anirudh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   With regards to the promotional notifications, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.   Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number '9986438663' from getting the promotional notifications. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information.   Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email id too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.   I certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile.   ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:

With regards to the promotional notifications, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern in regard to genuine medicines.      I wish to inform you that our Partner Retailers are government-accredited and authorised business owners who provide 100% Genuine medicines. We take the utmost care in selecting our Partner Retailers and maintain strict quality controls so that you always get standard quality products.     We maintain strict quality controls on all our partner retailers so that you always get standard quality products. We take utmost care in selecting our channel partners, and they, in turn, procure directly from the manufacturers/distributors.      Apart from this, every product is checked internally (sealing, manufacturing and expiry date) before any shipment is dispatched. Product manufacturing and expiry details are available on every product, as well.  ​   Kindly share the name of the medicine along with a clear image medicine in JPEG or PNG format so that we can assist you further     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Manisha

I wish to inform you that our Partner Retailers are government-accredited and authorised business owners who provide 100% Genuine medicines. We take the utmost care in selecting our Partner Retailers and maintain strict quality controls so that you always get standard quality products.

We maintain strict quality controls on all our partner retailers so that you always get standard quality products. We take utmost care in selecting our channel partners, and they, in turn, procure directly from the manufacturers/distributors. 

Apart from this, every product is checked internally (sealing, manufacturing and expiry date) before any shipment is dispatched. Product manufacturing and expiry details are available on every product, as well.

Apart from this, every product is checked internally (sealing, manufacturing and expiry date) before any shipment is dispatched. Product manufacturing and expiry details are available on every product, as well.

Kindly share the name of the medicine along with a clear image medicine in JPEG or PNG format so that we can assist you further

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Manisha

This email is in regards to the concern raised about your order #654361426697175040-70340.Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that all medicines were packed and delivered to you in proper and good condition as checked with our warehouse team. We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us. notes.body_html:
Hello Kiran,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regards to the concern raised about your order #654361426697175040-70340.Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that all medicines were packed and delivered to you in proper and good condition as checked with our warehouse team. However, the return medicine seal is in opened condition so neither refund is possible nor product will be returned as per policy, 
 
Your understanding is highly appreciated in this regard.
 
Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Team,     Customer is eligible for OTOF and same has been informed to Cx via call and email both.        Regards,  Shruti Vaviya  Complaints         

                           

                            On

                            Thu, 4 Dec at  2:49 PM

                            ,  Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>  wrote:

                             

 Team, 

   

 Check the same. 

   

   Regards, Grievance Helpdesk  

   

    ---------- Forwarded message --------- 

  

 

  

 From: PANIGRAHY GIRISH <girishgcp@rediffmail.com> Date: Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 10:01 PM Subject: Re: Regarding Service failure and OTOF against order id : VL7D4FB0 To: Complaints <complaints@thyrocare.com> Cc:  <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>,  <care@pharmeasy.in>   

 

 Dear Ms. Shruti Vaviya, and the PharmEasy Grievance Redressal Team, 

  



 I am writing in response to the email received on December 3, 2025, regarding Order ID VL7D4FB0, which denies my claim for the "On-Time or Free" (OTOF) benefit. 



 I strongly dispute the conclusion that I am ineligible for the OTOF offer based on the following facts: 



 

PharmEasy Initiated the Reschedule: The email acknowledges, "your order reschedule has been done for 01/12/2025 at 10.30 AM." This rescheduling was initiated by your team because the technician could not make the original time slot, not by me, the customer. 



 

Explicit Confirmation of Refund: During the call where your executive pre-intimated the delay and rescheduled the appointment, I was explicitly assured that the refund would be processed as per the OTOF scheme once the reports were generated. 



 

Audio Evidence: I had a specific conversation with your support executive confirming my eligibility for the refund. This commitment from your staff is binding. 



 The "On-Time or Free" promise is rendered void if PharmEasy can simply reschedule at the last minute due to their own operational failure and then deny the benefit. The terms and conditions clearly cover service failures caused by the provider. 



 I request that you: 



 a) Review the internal call recordings for the date of the rescheduling call to verify the executive's commitment. 



 b) Honor the OTOF scheme as promised by your representative. 



 c) Process the 100% refund (up to ₹1500) . 

  



 As this initial support channel has denied my legitimate claim, I am simultaneously escalating this matter to the Grievance Officer, as CC'd above. 



 I expect a satisfactory resolution and a final decision within 48 business hours. 

  



 Sincerely, 



 Girish Panigrahy 



 9594475756 



 Order ID: VL7D4FB0 

 

From: complaints@thyrocare.com 

Sent: Wed, 03 Dec 2025 14:55:34 

To: girishgcp@rediffmail.com 

Subject: Regarding Service failure and OTOF against order id : VL7D4FB0 

 

 

 

 Hi Jayanti Panigrahy, 



   



 Greetings from PharmEasy! 



   



 We would like to inform you that as verified your order reschedule has been done for 01/12/2025 at 10.30 AM. 



 And our executive given the pre intimation that sample collection should not be done as per the time, hence order rescheduled. 

 

We regret to inform you that we are unable to provide OTOF as per your request. 

 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website, listed in the Need Help section. 

 

Thank you for choosing Thyrocare. Have a great day ahead! 

 

Regards,  

Shruti Vaviya 

PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Souvik,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern regarding the order #654327772180357120-80468. I will surely assist you with the same.     As per the records, your order was cancelled on 06th December 2025. I apologise for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     Also, I would like to inform you that the products listed in the app are not linked to the price. Thus, we share the estimated cost at the time of order placement, which can be either higher or lower than the actual price. We send you an SMS/push notification for the total discounted amount that needs to be paid as soon as your medicines are procured.   Sometimes, the MRP of the medicines may vary depending on the stock received by the chemist. This price variation will always be due to price changes by the medicine manufacturer. However, if the pricing on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.     I see the refund of Rs. 2516.17 was initiated on 06th December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 3 to 5 working days from the date of initiation.     Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on Bank turnaround times. I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Souvik,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern regarding the order #654327772180357120-80468. I will surely assist you with the same.

As per the records, your order was cancelled on 06th December 2025. I apologise for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.

Also, I would like to inform you that the products listed in the app are not linked to the price. Thus, we share the estimated cost at the time of order placement, which can be either higher or lower than the actual price. We send you an SMS/push notification for the total discounted amount that needs to be paid as soon as your medicines are procured.

Sometimes, the MRP of the medicines may vary depending on the stock received by the chemist. This price variation will always be due to price changes by the medicine manufacturer. However, if the pricing on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.

I see the refund of Rs. 2516.17 was initiated on 06th December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 3 to 5 working days from the date of initiation.

Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on Bank turnaround times. I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Mohit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order 655139544058298368-73566, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mohit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order 655139544058298368-73566, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Hello Navjot,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654173318525198336-26575, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 05th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am writing to raise a serious concern regarding the pricing shown on your
platform. I have attached the screenshots for your reference.

Your app displays discounts of 16 or 21 percent on certain products, but
the moment they are added to the cart, the discount drops to 5 percent. I
have been a loyal customer for many years, and this sudden and drastic
change in pricing is unacceptable. My usual orders that used to cost around
3,000 or 4,000 have now jumped to 7,500. This appears to be misleading and
deceptive to customers.

I need an immediate and valid explanation for this discrepancy. If this
matter is not addressed properly, I will be left with no choice but to
consider taking legal action.

I expect your prompt response.

Regards
Dr. Charan Joshi

--

I am writing to raise a serious concern regarding the pricing shown on your platform. I have attached the screenshots for your reference.

notes.body: Hello Charan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​​   I understand your concern with regard to the discount. I will surely assist you with this.     The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha

notes.body:
Hello Manisha,

However, this still does not address my main concern. If the actual
discount is only available after applying a coupon code, then why are you
displaying a higher discount on the product page? This is misleading and
creates false pricing expectations for customers.

If the displayed prices are not accurate, it clearly feels like customers
are being misled. This has happened repeatedly, and the price difference is
too large to ignore.

I also want to bring to your notice that I have proof showing the prices
displayed upfront do not match the final amount even after applying the
suggested coupons. This confirms that the advertised discounts are not
actually being provided at checkout.

Due to the seriousness of this issue, I am submitting this matter to the
Consumer Forum, as such pricing practices are unacceptable. I expect a
transparent explanation and a clear assurance that this will be corrected
immediately.

Waiting for your valid response.

Meconerve:- 105*3 = 405
 But it shows 449? Which is illegal pratice

Regards,
Dr.Charan Joshi
notes.body_html:
Hello Manisha,

However, this still does not address my main concern. If the actual discount is only available after applying a coupon code, then why are you displaying a higher discount on the product page? This is misleading and creates false pricing expectations for customers.

If the displayed prices are not accurate, it clearly feels like customers are being misled. This has happened repeatedly, and the price difference is too large to ignore.

I also want to bring to your notice that I have proof showing the prices displayed upfront do not match the final amount even after applying the suggested coupons. This confirms that the advertised discounts are not actually being provided at checkout.

Due to the seriousness of this issue, I am submitting this matter to the Consumer Forum, as such pricing practices are unacceptable. I expect a transparent explanation and a clear assurance that this will be corrected immediately.

Waiting for your valid response.

Meconerve:- 105*3 = 405
 But it shows 449? Which is illegal pratice 

Regards,
Dr.Charan Joshi

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Subject: URGENT COMPLAINT – Delivery Agent Falsely Marked Delivery as
Delayed on My Request
Dear PharmEasy Team,
I am writing this to raise a serious complaint regarding my current order
(Amount: ₹4145.70), which contains essential medication for a rare medical
condition.
To my shock, the app is showing:
“Delivery is postponed on your request.”
I want to state clearly that I NEVER requested any postponement. This
misinformation is completely unacceptable.
The delivery agent has not contacted me, has not attempted delivery, and is
sitting at home while falsely updating the status as if I requested the
delay. This is a serious breach of responsibility and trust.
I have already tried reaching your customer care multiple times, but no
effective help has been provided. For someone dependent on this important
medication, such negligence can have serious health implications.
I expect the following immediately:
• Urgent investigation into the delivery agent’s misconduct.
• Immediate delivery of the medicine today itself, without any further
excuses.
• A written explanation for why such misinformation was added to my order
status.
If this issue is not resolved promptly, I will be forced to escalate this
matter to higher authorities and submit a formal complaint regarding
service negligence.
Kindly treat this complaint as highest priority.
Regards,
M DANISH FIROZ
7017296368
Order ID: 654830374315053056

--

notes.body: Hello Vishal,  Greetings from PharmEasy!   With regards to your order #655005130221420544-79154, I understand your concern. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.  As per our records, I see that your order was cancelled on 3rd December 2025 at 06:26 PM.  The refund amount of Rs. 943.43 was initiated on 3rd December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (570308000840).     Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.  I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.         Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Vishal,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #655005130221420544-79154, I understand your concern. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per our records, I see that your order was cancelled on 3rd December 2025 at 06:26 PM.

The refund amount of Rs. 943.43 was initiated on 3rd December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (570308000840).

Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.
